name: Java Database Abstraction Layer
short_description: The jdbal project is a database abstraction layer written in java to provide a inheritable class structure for ejb 3.0 like objects.  The key component of this application is the database abstraction coupled with inheritable table based objects.

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU General Public License version 2.0 (GPLv2)
